review_title: Care is great, IT is lacking,
job_title: Systems Administrator in Las Vegas, NV
pros: Great care for the terminally ill.  Compassionate employees treat their charges professionally and with deepest concern for their well being.
cons: IT stall is OVER utilized.  four people to handle four locations, one 60 miles away.  All non-medical electronic equipment including land lines, cell phone, computers, printers, routers, backups, servers, scanners and video.  One of the three has to remain on the helpdesk at all times.  Agreed to 55K/year, was cut to 50K a year upon employemnt

review_title: Bad Mangement will discuss many workers. MICROMANAGEMENT
pros: Good Benefits regarding health insurance. PTO was OK but you had to get approval to take the time and it was very rarely given. Efforts to make employees feel like a unit but the result was a few clicks and the majority of the employees were searching for other jobs.
cons: Work / Life balance is awful!!  It is the norm to have multiple bosses.  The company prides itself on listening, however, that does not apply to management.  Your concerns are heard but no action is taken. The old saying "if you don't like it here find another employer." Many smart employees are exiting.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Las Vegas, NV
pros: Some caring staff, benefits, PTO, patients are great though RN case load too high
cons: Inept management. New story every day.  No one knows what the other is doing. Awful communication and high expectations.  Caring for too many patients. Am seeing patients in all parts of Valley and spend too much time driving. Unorganized. Was directly lied to by upper management. Favoritism is evident. Looking for other work.

job_title: Senior Business Development Representative in Las Vegas, NV
pros: Business Oriented Leadership, open door policy, Goal Driven, good benefits, support of staff and incredible CEO.  One of the best jobs I ever had in my 28 year career.  A great 7 years spent employed at NAH.
cons: Can be a lack, by some,  in recognition or appreciation of marketing staff.

review_title: I loved working here but they don't treat the good employees fairly
